short_title: Coal Severance Tax Limitation Act of 1981

summary.text: Coal Severance Tax Limitation Act of 1981 - Amends the Powerplant and Industrial Fuel Use Act of 1978 to limit to 12 1/2 percent of the value of the coal produced yearly the amount of all State and local severance taxes or fees on coal mined from Indian or Federal lands and shipped in interstate commerce to any powerplant or major installation.
